name: Isles Away
description:
'Isles Away' is the result of the Text-Based Game Jam (July, 2022).

We had one week to create a narrative-based game, where we could ONLY use a terminal. No audio was allowed and art was only allowed for illustrations.

This jam gave birth to my first ever story branch-heavy game. It was quite the thrill as there was little time to come up with a story that would feel interesting to read and interactive enough. I hope you like it and here's a bit about the story:

You and your three friends have stranded on an inhabited island. See what happens! (Yes, I do not want to spoil more!)

I used Unity to make this story-driven game a reality.
We had one week for the jam, but I  had to make most of it during the evenings. Ultimately, I ended up developing this game in about 25 hours time.
